relation: Emporia State University's security places the student's well being as a top priority. Anything that happens on campus is dealt with in a efficient manner that leaves no doubt in anyone's mind that the campus is a safe place.
The food at Emporia is great. You have a variety of options to fit whatever you are craving.
Dorm life is geared toward incoming students to get connected, and to not feel isolated. The measures taken to achieve this goal makes students feel welcome and engages them in the campus life.

The academic standards that teachers as well as students place on themselves is great. Not only do you have teachers interested in you doing well, the students make a huge effort in making their experience at the University matter. This effort is recognized and is what allows the teachers to go that extra mile.

For prospective students, i encourage you to find something on campus and get involved. Rather it be a academic or extra curricular activity is up to you, just get involved. Making new connections and friends will expand your college experience.

Emporia is growing in student diversity that allows for a experience that will last a lifetime. The quality of teaching and the atmosphere of the classes will engage students from all backgrounds. My time here has been worthwhile, and it's because of the teachers, the environment that engages students, and the cultural diversity.

textAfterTable: 12/30/2009 Reviewer is A current student here. 4 out of 4 people found this review useful. 2 of 41 Categories Comments Great for these types of students If you love a having a good time, but at the same time learning and taking care of business this is the place for you. Tips for prospective students If you plan on attending Emporia State University you will have to attend swarm. Swarm is a very well organized freshman orentation which will allow you to view the campus and get a feel for the place. They will inform you on everything you need to know. As a freshman if you will be living in the dorms bring plenty of soap and towels. Bang for the buck The tution cost is relatively low compared to the level of teaching you will recieve. Emporia State university is among the top best teaching schools in the nation. Allowing for more bang for your buck. Taking advantage of the low prices to attend will land you in great classes allowing you to get everything you need to excel. Am
